name: Marathon
statement: You are given four distinct integers $$$a$$$, $$$b$$$, $$$c$$$, $$$d$$$. Timur and three other people are running a marathon. The value $$$a$$$ is the distance that Timur has run and $$$b$$$, $$$c$$$, $$$d$$$ correspond to the distances the other three participants ran. Output the number of participants in front of Timur.
inputFormat: The first line contains a single integer $$$t$$$ ($$$1 \leq t \leq 10^4$$$) — the number of test cases. The description of each test case consists of four distinct integers $$$a$$$, $$$b$$$, $$$c$$$, $$$d$$$ ($$$0 \leq a, b, c, d \leq 10^4$$$).
outputFormat: For each test case, output a single integer — the number of participants in front of Timur.
